archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.4.2a: a) the results of an information risk assessment (which includes analysis of threats, vulnerabilities, criticality of the information being accessed and the potential business impact if an information security incident occurs)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
